Verses: 1 pinbu Aaviyaanavar Ennai Eduththu, Ennaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Kizhakku Mugamaayirukkira Vaasalukkuk Konduponaar; Idho, Andha Vaasalin Nadaiyil Irubaththaindhu Purushar Irundhaargal; Avargalin Naduve Janaththin Prabukkalaagiya Aasoorin Kumaaranaagiya Yasaniyaavaiyum, Penaayaavin Kumaaranaagiya Belaththiyaavaiyum Kanden.
2 appozhudhu Avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Ivargal Indha Nagaraththile Akkiramamaana Ninaivugalai Ninaiththu, Dhuraalosanai Sollugira Manushar.
3 idhu Veedugalaik Kattuvadharkuk Kaalamalla Endrum, Indha Nagaram Paanai, Naangal Adhilulla Iraichchiyendrum Sollugiraargal.
4 aagaiyaal Avargalukku Virodhamaaith Theerkkadharisananchollu, Manupuththirane, Theerkkadharisananchollu Endraar.

5 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Aavi Enmel Iranginaar; Avar Ennai Nokki: Nee Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Isravel Vamsaththaare, Neengal Ippadip Pesugiradhu Undu; Ungal Manadhil Ezhumbugiradhai Naan Ariven.
6 indha Nagaraththil Neengal Anegaraik Kolaiseydheergal; Adhin Veedhigalaik Kolaiyundavargalaal Nirappineergal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

7 aagaiyaal Neengal Kolaiseydhu, Adhin Naduvil Pottuvittavargale Iraichchiyum, Indha Nagaram Paanaiyumaame; Ungalaiyo Adharkul Iraadhapadikkup Purambaakkuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
8 pattayaththukku Bayappatteergal, Pattayaththaiye Ungalmel Varappannuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
9 naan Ungalai Adharkul Iraadhapadikku Purambaakki, Ungalai Anniyarin Kaiyil Oppukkoduththu, Ungalil Nyaayaththeerppugalai Niraivetruven.
10 pattayaththaal Vizhuveergal; Isravel Dhesaththin Ellaiyile Ungalai Nyaayantheerppen; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal.
11 indha Nagaram Ungalukkup Paanaiyaayiruppadhumillai, Neengal Adhilulla Iraichchiyaayiruppadhumillai; Isravel Dhesaththin Ellaiyile Ungalai Nyaayantheerppen.

12 en Kattalaigalinpadi Nadavaamalum, En Nyaayangalinpadi Seyyaamalum, Ungalai Sutrilumirukkira Purajaadhigaludaiya Muraimaigalinpadi Seydha Neengal Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal Endru Sol Endraar.

13 naan Ippadith Theerkkadharisananchollugaiyil, Penaayaavin Kumaaranaagiya Belaththiyaa Seththaan; Appozhudhu Naan Mugankuppura Vizhundhu, Magaa Saththamaai: Aa,karththaraagiya Aandavare, Dhevareer Isravelil Meedhiyaanavargalai Sarvasangaarancheyveero Endru Muraiyitten.
14 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

15 manupuththirane, Neengal Karththarai Vittu Dhooramaai Pongal, Engalukku Indha Dhesam Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkappattadhendru, Un Sagodhararukkum, Un Kudumbaththaarukkum, Un Pandhu Janangalukkum, Isravel Vamsaththaar Anaivarukkum, Erusalemin Kudigal Sollugiraargal.

16 aagaiyaal Naan Avargalai Dhooramaagap Purajaadhigalukkulle Thuraththiyirundhaalum, Naan Avargalai Dhesangalile Sidharadiththaalum, Naan Avargal Pona Dhesangalil Avargalukkuk Konja Kaalaththukkup Parisuththa Sthalamaaga Iruppen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol.

17 aadhalaal Naan Ungalai Janangalidaththilirundhu Serththu, Neengal Sidharadikkappatta Dhesangalilirundhu Ungalaik Koottikkondu, Isravel Dhesaththai Ungalukkuk Koduppen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sollu.
18 avargal Ange Vandhu, Adhil Seeyendrigazhappadaththakkadhum Aruvarukkappadaththakkadhumaayirukkiradhaiyellaam Adhilirundhu Agatruvaargal.

19 avargal En Kattalaigalinpadi Nadandhu, En Nyaayangalaik Kaikkondu, Avaigalinpadi Seyya Naan Avargalukku Ega Irudhayaththai Thandhu, Avargal Ullaththil Pudhiya Aaviyaikkoduththu, Kallaana Irudhayaththai Avargal Maamsaththilirundhu Eduththuppottu, Sadhaiyaana Irudhayaththai Avargalukku Aruluven.
20 avargal En Janamaayiruppaargal, Naan Avargal Dhevanaayiruppen.

21 aanaalum Seeyendrigazhappadaththakkadhum Aruvarukkappadaththakkadhumaana Thangal Irudhayaththin Ichchaiyile Evargal Nadakkiraargalo Avargaludaiya Vazhiyin Palanai Avargal Thalaigalinmel Sumarappannuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
22 appozhudhu Kerubeengal Thangal Settaigalai Viriththu Ezhumbina; Sakkarangalum Avaigalukku Aruge Sendrana; Isravelin Dhevanudaiya Magimai Avaigalinmel Uyara Irundhadhu.
23 karththarudaiya Magimai Nagaraththin Naduvilirundhezhumbi, Nagaraththukkuk Kizhakke Irukkira Malaiyinmel Poi Nindradhu.

24 pinbu Aaviyaanavar Ennai Eduththu, Ennai Dhevanudaiya Aavikkullaana Dharisanaththile Kaldheyaavukku Siraippattupponavargal Idaththile Kondupoi Vittaar; Appozhudhu Naan Kanda Dharisanam Ennilirundhu Edupattuppoyitru.
25 karththar Enakkuk Kaanbiththa Yaavaiyum Siraiyiruppilirundhavargalukku Sonnen.
